root.name: Konami Classics Series: Arcade Hits
root.description: You will see some familiar classics.This Nintendo DS game collection includes:GradiusRush'n AttackContraScrambleHorror MazePooyanTime PilotRoc'n RopeTrack and FieldCircus CharlieBasketballRoad FighterYie Ar KUNG-FURainbow BellShao-Lin's RoadSome interesting additions to this set of classic titles is the ability to adjust settings in an interface that looks like the arcade board dip switches. These changes can alter basic gameplay elements such as number of lives, difficulty, and bonuses. Cooperative play is possible as well as sharing a game demo or sending game replays to other DS owners. Other features include the ability to adjust the screen display of the game as some of these older games have a different format than what is natively available on the DS.Other nice touches to this cartridge are the inclusion of printed materials relevant to the games and a complete library of the original music.
